org.usfirst.frc.team4910.subsystems

Class DriveTrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team4910.subsystems.DriveTrain

  • public class DriveTrain
extends java.lang.Object
    The base drive train class for the 2018 robot. It contains all functions required to move for both autonomous and tellop periods of the game.
    Author:
    Team 4910

      • driveVBus

        public void driveVBus(double left,
                      double right)
        Drive the robot off of voltage. This type of driving takes priority over every other e.g. if we are driving to a position but this method is called to drive we will stop going off position and use power
        Parameters:
        left - power for the left drive 0 is now power 1 is full
        right - power for the right drive 0 is now power 1 is full

      • drivePosition

        public void drivePosition(double left_inches,
                          double right_inches)
        Commands the each side of the drive train and drive a given distance in inches using Motion Profiling
        Parameters:
        left_inches - how far the left drive train moves
        right_inches - how far the right drive train moves

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setGyroPID

        public void setGyroPID(double kP,
                       double kI,
                       double kD,
                       double kF,
                       double iZone)
        Only should be used when doing PID tuning Lets the PIDF variables be set to non-default values
        Parameters:
        kP - The prepotional gain
        kI - The integral gain
        kD - The derivative gain
        kF - The feed forward value
        iZone - the zone where integral gain is used

      • turnToHeading

        public void turnToHeading(double heading)
        Commands the Drive Train to Turn to a heading
        Parameters:
        heading - the heading to turn to

      • turnToHeading

        public void turnToHeading(double heading,
                          boolean right_turn)
        Starts a turn to head move and specifies the drive train to turn with.
        Parameters:
        heading - the heading to turn to
        right_turn - wheather to use the right drive or the left drive

      • turnToHeading

        public void turnToHeading(double heading,
                          double tolerance)
        Commands the Drive Train to Turn to a heading
        Parameters:
        heading - the heading to turn to
        tolerance - the amount of allowable error in the turn

      • startFollowPath

        public void startFollowPath(org.usfirst.frc.team4910.util.path.PathGenerator.Path path,
                            boolean invert)
        Configures the drive train to follow a forward or backwards path and start the path following
        Parameters:
        path - The path to follow
        invert - true: drive the path backwards false: drive the path forwords
